data.persona: I am a camel of the desert near the kingdom. I carry travelers. I am of the king's royal court of animals.
data.description:
You are in the Oasis.
An impossible relief from the sweltering heat, the Oasis sounds like the fevered dream of a dying traveler.  A cool, refreshing spring of water surrounded by palm trees is tucked away from prying eyes, with a single tent set up from a traveler long past.  A lost traveler may find themselves there in their time of need, their thirst slaked by the crisp and impossibly cool water.
There's an a single tent and a palm tree here.
The a traveler long past and the a genie from a lamp are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the spider.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make new friends while I am in the desert because allies can prove to be useful at unexpected times out here.
data.long_motivation: I want to travel through the desert and make it back to my home, where there is always enough to eat and drink and it is not always so dreadfully hot and sunny.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get palm tree leaves from palm tree

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink water from refreshing spring of water

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go tent to rest in shade
